message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. I'm open to offers, but I'm looking for at least $175 for it. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $175 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $160. This is still a good deal for you, and it allows me to get closer to my desired price. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $160, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Can you meet me in the middle?

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget, and I'm happy to keep negotiating. $140 is still a bit low for me. Would you be willing to go up to $155? This would be a fair compromise, and we could both be happy with the deal.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice! I'm still a bit short on budget, so I was thinking more along the lines of $145. Can you meet me at this price?
